website_summaries.verdict: A budget computer for VR that nonetheless has some serious gaming muscle.
pros: Boasts a powerful mid-range processor and a good graphics card at its price point
Plenty of connectors for VR accessories
cons: May need RAM and graphics card upgrades as VR tech advances

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product twice in one month. The first computer's video card didn't work from the get-go. I returned it and got another new one - same model. The audio on the second brand new one didn't work and their support team advised I return it. I'm done. I've wasted hours with tech support and 2 returns. I don't have time for this. Disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: CANT INSTALL UPDATES!! BLACK SCREEN OF DEATH AFTER 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my pc for 2 months now. I bought a new mouse and keyboard to use, but sadly when I plug any usb device into my pc, it says drivers can’t be found. I also can’t download updates for windows for some reason. Contacted support and was told to download the chipset driver from their website. So I did, and as soon as it downloaded I’ve been stuck at a black screen. That’s been 3 days now. Their support has been very reluctant to do anything for me. Save urself time and hassle, don’t buy a PC with AMD graphics cards. I believe this is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: lions2thebowl

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had no troubles with running any games. This system is great for mid level gamers. Have connected my Oculus Quest to this computer for Oculus Link and it runs smoothly. Very happy with my purchase. It is a little noisy, but much of that can't be helped. Wish they would have put in 16Gb of RAM instead of just 8Gb, considering the cost to them would be very small, but I can do that so I can't complain too much. Have not yet needed Tech Support, so I can't comment on the quality of that. Also wish the keyboard had backlights, but the mouse is pretty nice looking. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gaming computer for a mid level-upper level gamer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pc based on the pc reviews from google search. My husband wanted a pc that was very sufficient for games like Skyrim etc. And it is; it is a great gamer pc and it has all the bells and whistles that any gamer will love. It runs very quiet; and we even like Windows 10...lol. This is exactly the gaming pc we wanted and even though I do not game like my husband does, I will be buying one for myself at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: New to computer gaming systems, I did alot of research before buying, I wanted a good quality motherboard that would last me a few years. Reviews said this is a good one, since I'm new to gaming tech I dont have anything to compare other than a motherboard I was going to purchase for $600 at bestbuy, this one is a little more but has more storage runs on Intel 5 and has worked perfectly so far. It looks great and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This computer is great!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is amazing in all fields of what it's meant to be; a gaming computer. It comes with pre-loaded items that make your gaming experience much better, like a panel where you can press a button and it instantly changes the color of the computer's lighting. It's also already connected, so you don't need to hook it up yourself. Now, the computer itself. The computer is really fast and easy to set up. Whenever playing games I always experience at a high framerate.
customer_reviews.author: V. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great Starter Computer for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I am 12 and I set this computer myself with hardly any help. It's a good PC. I am playing games and recording on it. Most games work great, but a big game like CS Go lagged a bit. But that could have to do with our wifi, so I didn't dock a star. It's also very cool looking in case that matters to you. You can change the mouse color too. The mouse and keyboard have worked well so far, but the keyboard is a little noisy if you're trying to record. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does tend to freeze up all the time while working in it. I do not do gaming I use the machine for photography
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids play Minecraft and Roblox and are always on steam playing goofy games. When I get actually get on it and the kids aren’t taking it over, I use it to do my emails.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the computer the graphics card was damaged, and didn’t work. But I called customer support, and they were extremely helpful and, they had me send back my pc for repair. Got my pc back in a week. It runs extremely well, and doesn’t make to much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Beblyn Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Suprised
customer_reviews.text: All my friends were telling me not to buy a pre built gaming pc. They had all built their own. It's not because I couldn't afford spending more. It's because I didn't want to wait and I have no idea how to build one anyway. So I bought this PC and I bought 16GB DDR4 Ram. I paired the two and wow. My PC runs equal or better than most of my friends and they were all surprised. Huge shout out to CyberPower for making this PC affordable and high performance. Even the cable management inside looks great. Came in fast and without a doubt I rate this PC 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Alrobee

customer_reviews.title: Love this PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC a few months ago and it’s been great. I got it hooked up and had no issues. It runs every game I play with it. Only thing I didn’t like about this PC is the 8GB ram stick just for the fact I could t find another of the same stick. I upgraded to 16GB Corsair with RGB and now it’s just how I want it. Only reason I didn’t give text 5 star is because I never had to call them
customer_reviews.author: Russell Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming pc.I'm learning how to play Ironsight before moving on to Apex or Fortnite as I have never played on pc always played on console but this CYBERPOWERPC has been great so far in terms of performance.I did have a small issue with the graphics card but customer/technical support helped me through it and everything has been working fine since then.I would definitely recommend CYBERPOWERPC to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christian I.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described and Completely Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it runs quiet. I absolutely LOVED the way it was shipped. The box wasn't damaged and the computer was well protected on the inside. They took great care in making sure the components were all safe for shipping. I was very impressed with the quality of the computer, but especially with the attention to keeping the cords/wires inside all contained. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Coley

customer_reviews.title: Cyberpower Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: PC was ready to go out of the box and in perfect condition. Performs smoothly for gaming and every day use. I use it on a daily basis for gaming and video recording/editing and there's hardly any hiccups. Gaming: This is a very good starter gaming PC. Most everything can be played on Ultra or the highest settings without drops in FPS. The best part is the fact that there's little to no bloatware. Very rarely does the system get hot and fans are quiet. I do recommend getting a CPU fan, but the stock CPU fan does its job fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Palamecia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and am very happy with my purchase. It has met all my expectations. I wish I had the option to buy in for 16gb of ram when purchasing. I don't know if it's necessary, but if you're gaming, then I definitely suggest getting an upgraded ram stick to pair with the original. Overall though, it is a very good product and 0 upgrades are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Will Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PC and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pc to use my Oculus Rift. It runs like a charm and the specs are awesome for the price That o bought if for. I can also replace internal hardware with ease and that’s what I need. No hassle for upgrades at all. It’s been about month since I started using it and works great with games like overwatch and fortnite. All in all I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it. I don’t write to many reviews but only when it needs some recognition I will definitely write about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful first PC for someone who's just starting out. Quick, easy startup, and the keyboard, mouse, and mousepad that all came with it are all high quality. The lights aren't harsh and blinding, and it's nice being able to adjust the colors with the little remote that came with it. Runs all my favorite games just fine, too. So far, after a few days of pretty heavy use, I'm really loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: my 16 yr old, who uses Steam constantly LOVES this in about 6 months the LED light have gone out, so he is disappointed with that
customer_reviews.author: dupont2010

customer_reviews.title: Superb gaming Computer!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is everything I was looking for! Everything runs smoothly and plays games like fortnite with ease at the best gaming quality! I plan on getting another for my family soon. This computer does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great PC so far! It sometimes can get pretty noisy and releases a lot of heat depending on the types of games you're playing. Easily can run fortnite and CS:GO at max settings with 60fps. I haven't played very high demanding games on this setup yet, but I'm sure it can handle medium settings on games such as Assassins Creed and Horizon Zero Dawn. Totally satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Love our new CyberPowerPC!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got a new CyberPowerPC for Christmas and they love it!!! It's great that it comes fully put together.. taking the guess work out of building a gaming PC. It has plenty of power for any of the games they play, but as with any new PC, they are already looking at customizing it. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: I had some troubles after a week or two with apps crashing after a few hours and I had to restart my PC for it to work properly again. However, I factory reset and it has worked perfectly since. May want to purchase a ram stick if you want to play a game, use discord, and watch youtube at the same time. But then again I rarely have problems doing all 3 at once anyway. Overall this is a great product and I am very glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy it’s not even funny
customer_reviews.text: I’m not used to using pc for gaming but this was easy to set up and easier to use. Definitely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ismael & Mayra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for playing games at 1080 resolution. It is very bright but quite quiet for the number of fans in it.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Cyberpower pc
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy set up and the option of changing the light display, which is a very cool feature as well as the remote control that comes with it. So far I am very pleased and excited to see how this pc will enhance my gaming experience. Kathy Daniels
customer_reviews.author: kathy daniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pc for new and advanced gamers
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a not too expensive pc that still is high in performance I would recommend this pc. It honestly amazed me when I first started playing on it. Once I tweaked settings in fortnite it gave a consistent 200 FPS at mostly epic and high settings. It’s start and load times are amazing and it also is amazing for vr and runs most vr games with no frame drops and amazing quality. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jill Corwin

customer_reviews.title: never waste my money here again  think i should be reinburst for my stress and trouble
customer_reviews.text: product was ready to play was a lie bought this for my grandson has never got to enjoy it is now having things put in for it to work right a big waste of my money learned my lessen the hard way
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart and looks like it was rushed to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christopherproblems

customer_reviews.title: It generally works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup and i really enjoyed it for what it really was,if anything just upgrade the ram if you need more and please don't downgrade it with a terrible resolution monitor since this thing can handle r6 at 140 fps on max,fortnite 100 fps on epic settings,apex legends on 80 max,you get the point.If anything it can get annoying hearing the low hum but that's my only complaint since this thing is more than what it is worth!4/5 would recommend for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Elox2000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pre-built computer
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to read great reviews on this computer, and It works great. I am not a tech mogul and had zero interest in building my own gaming computer, and was pleased with these specs. With the extended warranty, this computer was very worth my money. :)
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: Beware of seller!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Computer and it looks great, however nothing works in it....day one the RAM was corrupted so CyberpowerPC told us to send the RAM back. We did, and when they got it back they would not fix or repair it and wouldn't send the RAM back to us, so I bought another RAM, then the audio stopped working, Called CyberpowerPC and they would not do anything, So clearly there is absolutely NO warranty. Run
customer_reviews.author: Misty G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this PC. It's my first gaming pc and im astonished by how good the graphics are. The first thing I downloaded was Warframe and when I started the game I changed the resolution to native 4k and was blown away by how great it looked and ran. Everything else is very fast too like browsing the web and whatnot and switching between applications. I'm very pleased with the computer
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: I change my mind
customer_reviews.text: I need to change my 5-star review to a 1 or possibly no star review because the PC (unknown to me) came damaged and worked for a solid hour, I can't boot up games without it shutting down. If you want a gaming PC, spend a bit more money and get a PC from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bad Squeaker
customer_reviews.text: The mouse quit working on day two what a piece of garbage not enough ram to run run the big maps on RUST
customer_reviews.author: Joseph d brogden

customer_reviews.title: Broken Upon Arrival 😮😟🤬
customer_reviews.text: The Unit Would Not Boot Up At All upon opening the packaging and assembling the PC to the monitor
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fast and easy to set up. I've only had it a few months and have only used it about ten times, but I have not had any issues thus far. I like that it comes with a remote for the lights to avoid the extra distraction when playing in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Overall, this pc is a really great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Pre-Built gaming PC I have bought, and I was not disappointed with my purchase. Overall, I really enjoy this computer and the experience it provides in gaming, as well as all of the cool features like the RGB fans on the case. It gives really good performance in most recent games, and I would definitely recommend this to a friend! I've had no issues with the tech support, and I am very satisfied with this PC.
customer_reviews.author: TurfCrazed

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not for serious gaming
customer_reviews.text: I’m not tech savvy, but this PC fulfills all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this pc gets over 120 frames on fortnite around 600 frames in Minecraft definitely recommend this pc
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Arboleda

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Received feb 22nd blue screen of death feb 24th. For the price I would have expected better quality. Called mfg on the 23rd about graphics card issue. Seems like the hard drive may have died though. No clue. Buyer beware. It did play games great while it worked. Anthem on high played fairly well. Turned to medium for better performance.
customer_reviews.author: AtomNEvo

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer to stream my Ps4. It streams perfectly at 1080. Led fans are a nice touch. Great video card for encoding. Gonna get little more memory for it. Plays any AAA games. I love it,
customer_reviews.author: Carver

customer_reviews.title: fps
customer_reviews.text: this is a great computer! doesnt come with a disc drive but you can buy a usb disk drive for $25 on amazon. it ran fortnite on full epic settings at 170 fps! it is a great price for what you get and if your an unknowing parent and your kids want a "gaming computer" or they want to "stream" or do youtube then you just found yourself the perfect computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: This computer's sound card stopped working after 30 days. With Covid-19, I understand tech support can be challenging, but CyberPower is providing inadequate support. I am not happy with my purchase at this point. Make sure to test out everything and run the pc hard.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: A Beast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old Lenovo was getting tired. Was wanting something to handle the games I play. I use PS Now, Blade and Souls, and LOL. This destroys those. I know LOL is easy to play but it runs that on highest settings at 250fps. It can also run BnS at max settings at 130fps which to me is insane. I highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt Howerton 3

customer_reviews.title: Amazing works great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: This pc is amazing for gaming sometimes the frames drop but other then that it works amazing i love it, 10/10 would definetily recommend
customer_reviews.author: O&B

customer_reviews.title: High Performance, high speed and functions at high level !!!  can’t ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son and he’s just so overwhelmed, it’s perfect , he said it’s the best ! He’s enjoying it so much , inspired him and promised to maintain good grades at school.!! only the best for my son ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Katkat

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GAMING PC
customer_reviews.text: Computer is great awesome Graphic card handles lots of AAA Games and gets more than 60 FPS on most games And is easily upgradeable if needed but out the box it is awesome I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Am20

customer_reviews.title: First Gaming Desktop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming desktop and I was really excited for it to arrive. From the first impression I really like it. One thing that had me worried was the rear fan was not working initially but as the instruction said the wiring was disconnected during the shipping. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Luuya

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level pc
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up fast and it’s super quiet. Only falls to it is the side glass has smudge that won’t come off from the packaging inside the tower. Also the front cover blocks the fans from pulling in air to keep it cool. But honestly plays most of my games at max settings so good entry level pc
customer_reviews.author: david foster

customer_reviews.title: Awsome PC
customer_reviews.text: This computer is so helpful and so good for gaming This is the fastest gaming computer I have had, this is faster then a Xbox and PS4 combined Cyberpower will always be a trustful gaming PC I also love the awesome lights with is they look awesome thank you cyberpower for this amazing outstanding PC.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Computer!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gaming computer. This is a great PC to use and I enjoy it a lot for my gaming! If you are like me and are trying to find a starter gaming PC, look no further! It looks cool, runs fast, and the keyboard and mouse are awesome! It was really easy to set up! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MingHsien Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This computer is AH-mazing! We did have to return the first computer sent to us because the graphics card shifted in shipping which apparently caused some serious over heating issues, but we received a replacement from Amazon in 2 days and it's perfect. Tech support from CyberpowerPC was also great!
customer_reviews.author: CyberSigyn6

customer_reviews.title: PC master race
customer_reviews.text: First time pc user and all I have to say is this things blows consoles out of the water. Best purchase or my life
customer_reviews.author: tsm94

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast...I'm a novice gamer and have learned alot with this build...upgraded the ram and am stean rollin through games and music production!! I'ts beautiful in design...quiet as a mouse and ready ootb!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is great for somebody that doesn’t have a lot of experience gaming with a PC it was easy to use and the learning curve was bearable all you need is a basic knowledge of a computer. It looks really cool also. All in all I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricshall

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: What a great experience. Fast delivery. Easy set up. Gaming is awesome. Playing games like WOW is a game changer. Flawless loading. Love everything so far. Great computer for anyone looking for a gaming computer and everyday use computer
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: I play video games, and needed a new PC as the laptop wasn't enough for the games I use. This was a great choice and it was recommended to me by my boyfriend who has the same one!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: PC stopped working after only 6 months. Company will not respond to calls, emails or chats on their tech support site. Reading other reviews this is a common occurence with this company. $800 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great starting pc
customer_reviews.text: This computer so far is really good. Ive only had it for about a week, and i havent run into any problems. It is super quiet, and comes with more colors than just red that you can change. Mouse and keyboard are a nice edition as well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer for use in an office to run AutoCAD and it works great. Plan on upgrading the rest of the computers in this office to this PC. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SIULMAI

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It plays GTA5 very well, and there wasn't any annoying bloatware preinstalled. My only problem is the front panel restricts airflow too much making the whole PC run hot, pulling it off while gaming solves the problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Christohper

customer_reviews.title: A solid gaming PC for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I've been working with the computer for about a week now, and it seems solid. Once you add an SSD, a PCle wifi card and some more RAM, it is quite speedy, and has the potential to be easily modified in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Computer
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer. My 9 year old son set it up himself with no issues. Only had it for four days but it’s running smoothly, no problems as mentioned in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this computer has worked great. It came well packaged with clear instructions. It started right up right out of the box without any problems. It works great for everyday tasks such as web surfing, emails and playing video games.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for around 2 weeks and I had no problem with it! It runs all the games I play on max graphics smoothly. I highly recommend this gaming PC and it was very easy to set up and start playing!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ososkie

customer_reviews.title: Video card failure
customer_reviews.text: The video card failed after 3 weeks. I replaced it with a spare. Generally my experience with this brand has been good but, pretty annoying all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Build your own PC.
customer_reviews.text: The product looked nice on the outside but powered on. Continuous crashes ontop of bull performance and it's just been one of the worst Amazon buys I have purchased in years.
customer_reviews.author: Kreo

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I've had this PC for a few weeks, and so far it works great. I've played games like CS:GO, Rainbow Six Siege, and a few others. Its held up well and isn't very loud. I am overall happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: This computer is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this computer for a few days, but it is amazing. It has run every game that I've played perfectly and barely makes any noise. I just love this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No WiFi?!?!
customer_reviews.text: There is not a WiFi card embedded in the computer. You have to set up with ethernet or a 2 year old usb WiFi adapter included in the packaging. None of this is pointed out in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Really Great
customer_reviews.text: Really great desktop. The fans are pretty much silent. I am able to run many of my favorite games without too much lag.
customer_reviews.author: Ken878

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed! Such a great computer for the price! Easiest set up for a computer noob like me. Has run all the games fairly well! Isn’t super noisy at all which is huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: cassady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect starting computer for anyone. It has plenty of space for upgrades, you won't be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: The computer works great for all gaming applications. Super fast and easy to set up!!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN A CHROBACK

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this computer. From what I know, it has met all his expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming computer. Fast, well equipped, paired with a good monitor its money well spent. I would highly recommend if you in the market for your next gaming computer!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K.

customer_reviews.title: High Defective Percentage Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a day and the whole power distribution went bad, very high percentage of defects from this company, and very poor customer service and very poor support.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: My son did research for a while and found this computer. He thinks it is excellent, good price and he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Cadena-Forney

customer_reviews.title: It is a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: It is a little noisy but performs well I have had no issue with it it came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t mean to get the one without built in WiFi!! But this has awesome graphics, super fast, working amazingly well for VR games. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Augustbluejay

customer_reviews.title: Be careful !
customer_reviews.text: One of the main parts went out within a couple of months .
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I ordered. The build is just wonderful, and perfectly capable of running games at 4K 60fps. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice gamer pc
customer_reviews.text: Surprised it's built without Bluetooth , and it arrived without Keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: rtwedd

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this computer
customer_reviews.text: The computer looks great, however the VGA port doesn't seem to be ready to used, a DVI cable might be the solution
customer_reviews.author: zzhou1

customer_reviews.title: Fortnite
customer_reviews.text: This pc runs fortnite very well. It can run epic settings and over 100 fps. It is a very good gaming pc.
customer_reviews.author: Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer For Price

product_meta.description: Size:Graphics: Radeon RX 580| Style:Processor: Intel Core i5-9400FDestroy the competition with the Cyber PowerPC Gamer Xtreme series of gaming desktops. The Gamer Xtreme series features the latest generation of high performance Intel Core processors and ultra-quick DDR RAM to easily handle system-intensive tasks, such as high definition video playback and gaming. Coupled with powerful discreet video cards, the Gamer Xtreme series provides a smooth gaming and multimedia experience.
